interactivity.requirements: 40 Futaba Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Skin (Start Somewhere) " from Futaba Fukuyama Seen " Abyss " from Yumi Yamaguchi Seen " Clouds " from Kaori Kadowaki

progression.synopsis: Futaba is talking to her parents on the phone â€” it seems that they will not be able to visit her after all. Afterwards, Futaba tells Sensei that her gym visit went well. They have different opinions about whether it is worth taking a harder path for the sake of improving yourself. She finally tells him about her eating disorder. He thanks her for confiding in him, although declines her offer to share any of his own insecurities. The conversation turns back to the gym, and Sensei mentions that the " scary blonde woman " there was Yumi 's mother.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .18p1.
